name: twitter-bot
description: A bot for searching twitter and performing actions, supports both Twitter streams and standard polling.

scripts.coverage: rm -rf lib-cov && jscoverage lib lib-cov && TWITTER_BOT_COV=1 mocha -R html-cov > coverage.html && open coverage.html
scripts.coveralls: rm -rf lib-cov && jscoverage lib lib-cov && TWITTER_BOT_COV=1 node_modules/.bin/mocha -R mocha-lcov-reporter | sed 's,SF:,SF:lib/,' | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js
scripts.codeclimate: export CODECLIMATE_REPO_TOKEN=cb11de025c8df27bb28527df703bb3cf04ac6dd12df48511c78a08a2e35fdc70 && rm -rf lib-cov && jscoverage lib lib-cov && TWITTER_BOT_COV=1 node_modules/.bin/mocha -R mocha-lcov-reporter | sed 's,SF:,SF:lib/,' | ./node_modules/codeclimate-test-reporter/bin/codeclimate.js
